title: Martial Weapons
content: +1 Piercing Uncommon 1.5m Light Finesse Weapon Enchantment +1FlourishPiercing Strike Sword of Clutching Umbra 1d6+1 Piercing Rare 1.5m Light Finesse Shadowsoaked Strike: Strike an enemy, adding your Proficiency Bonus to the damage. Moreover, if the attack hits, it blow deals an additional 1d6 Psychic Damage. This attack doesn't break concealment.Weapon Enchantment +1FlourishPiercing Strike Sword of Life Stealing 1d6+2 Piercing Very Rare 1.5m Light Finesse Life Stealing Critical: On a Critical Hi
